mapper.insert: insert into referee_score (score, status, group_id, athlete_id, referee_id) values (#{score}, #{status}, #{groupId}, #{athleteId}, #{refereeId})
mapper.update: update referee_score set score = #{score}, status = #{status}, group_id = #{groupId}, athlete_id = #{athleteId}, referee_id = #{refereeId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select (select count(id) from referee_score where group_id = #{groupId} and status = 1) = (select count(id) from referee_score where group_id = #{groupId})
